custom_pdh_lock.name: PDH Lock Box
custom_pdh_lock.description: Pound-Drever-Hall frequency locking electronics that processes reflected pump light from PDH Detector and generates error signal to stabilize cavity resonance via piezo feedback to Output Coupler

parameters.description: Pound-Drever-Hall frequency locking electronics that processes reflected pump light from PDH Detector and generates error signal to stabilize cavity resonance via piezo feedback to Output Coupler

custom_spectrum_analyzer.name: RF Spectrum Analyzer
custom_spectrum_analyzer.description: Electronic spectrum analyzer measuring the difference photocurrent from balanced homodyne detector (Photodiode 1 minus Photodiode 2) to observe noise reduction below shot noise limit indicating squeezing

parameters.description: Electronic spectrum analyzer measuring the difference photocurrent from balanced homodyne detector (Photodiode 1 minus Photodiode 2) to observe noise reduction below shot noise limit indicating squeezing

custom_coincidence_counter.name: Coincidence Counter
custom_coincidence_counter.description: Time-to-digital converter electronically processing outputs from SPAD 1 and SPAD 2 to measure coincidence events within 1ns timing window as delay stage is scanned

parameters.description: Time-to-digital converter electronically processing outputs from SPAD 1 and SPAD 2 to measure coincidence events within 1ns timing window as delay stage is scanned

custom_classical_channel.name: Classical Communication
custom_classical_channel.description: Classical channel transmitting Alice's Bell measurement results (which of 4 detectors fired) to Bob to determine correct unitary correction operations on his photon

parameters.description: Classical channel transmitting Alice's Bell measurement results (which of 4 detectors fired) to Bob to determine correct unitary correction operations on his photon

custom_active_polarization_encoder.name: Alice Encoder
custom_active_polarization_encoder.description: Active polarization encoder using Pockels cells or liquid crystal modulators to randomly prepare photons in H, V, +45, or -45 polarization states based on random basis and bit selection

parameters.description: Active polarization encoder using Pockels cells or liquid crystal modulators to randomly prepare photons in H, V, +45, or -45 polarization states based on random basis and bit selection

custom_timing_electronics.name: Timing & Sifting Unit
custom_timing_electronics.description: Electronic system that timestamps all detector events, performs basis reconciliation via classical channel, calculates QBER for eavesdropping detection, and executes error correction and privacy amplification to generate final secure key

parameters.description: Electronic system that timestamps all detector events, performs basis reconciliation via classical channel, calculates QBER for eavesdropping detection, and executes error correction and privacy amplification to generate final secure key
parameters.functions: timestamping, basis sifting, QBER calculation, error correction, privacy amplification

custom_fiber_network.name: 5-Mode Interferometer
custom_fiber_network.description: Integrated photonic chip implementing programmable 5-mode unitary transformation using Reck decomposition: 8 tunable beam splitters arranged in 2 layers with 5 phase shifters between layers. Transmittances: BS1=0.67, BS2=0.5, BS3=0.33, BS4=0.5, BS5-8=0.5. Phase shifters provide 0-360 degree control for arbitrary unitary matrix implementation.

parameters.description: Integrated photonic chip implementing programmable 5-mode unitary transformation using Reck decomposition: 8 tunable beam splitters arranged in 2 layers with 5 phase shifters between layers. Transmittances: BS1=0.67, BS2=0.5, BS3=0.33, BS4=0.5, BS5-8=0.5. Phase shifters provide 0-360 degree control for arbitrary unitary matrix implementation.

custom_feedforward_electronics.name: Feedforward Unit
custom_feedforward_electronics.description: Electronic system that processes homodyne measurement results (X and P quadratures) from Alice's Bell detection and generates real-time feedforward signals with gain G to control displacement operations at Bob's station. Receives electrical signals from Homodyne X and Homodyne P detectors and outputs control voltages to Displacement X and Displacement P EOMs.

parameters.description: Electronic system that processes homodyne measurement results (X and P quadratures) from Alice's Bell detection and generates real-time feedforward signals with gain G to control displacement operations at Bob's station. Receives electrical signals from Homodyne X and Homodyne P detectors and outputs control voltages to Displacement X and Displacement P EOMs.

custom_oam_sorter.name: OAM Sorter H
custom_oam_sorter.description: Phase mask and mode converter that spatially separates photons by OAM charge into +ℓ and -ℓ output ports using geometric phase elements

parameters.description: Phase mask and mode converter that spatially separates photons by OAM charge into +ℓ and -ℓ output ports using geometric phase elements

custom_lock_in_amplifier.name: Lock-In Amplifier
custom_lock_in_amplifier.description: Phase-sensitive detector that measures probe transmission while coupling laser is modulated, extracting the EIT signal from background absorption

parameters.description: Phase-sensitive detector that measures probe transmission while coupling laser is modulated, extracting the EIT signal from background absorption

custom_frequency_controller.name: Laser Frequency Control
custom_frequency_controller.description: Dual-channel frequency stabilization and scanning system that locks probe laser to Rb D2 line 5S_1/2(F=1) to 5P_3/2 transition and coupling laser to 5S_1/2(F=2) to 5P_3/2 transition, creating a Lambda-system with both lasers coupling to the same excited state. Scans probe detuning across EIT resonance.

parameters.description: Dual-channel frequency stabilization and scanning system that locks probe laser to Rb D2 line 5S_1/2(F=1) to 5P_3/2 transition and coupling laser to 5S_1/2(F=2) to 5P_3/2 transition, creating a Lambda-system with both lasers coupling to the same excited state. Scans probe detuning across EIT resonance.

custom_temperature_controller.name: Cell Heater
custom_temperature_controller.description: Precision temperature controller maintaining vapor cell at 60°C to achieve optimal atomic density (~10^11 atoms/cm³) for EIT observation. Heater wraps around vapor cell and maintains uniform temperature distribution.

parameters.description: Precision temperature controller maintaining vapor cell at 60°C to achieve optimal atomic density (~10^11 atoms/cm³) for EIT observation. Heater wraps around vapor cell and maintains uniform temperature distribution.

_description: Custom components defined by LLM for specialized equipment not in standard library
